text: Kogda cheloveka postigayet zlo ili on terpit ubytki, on, chuvstvuya svoyu bespomoshchnost', obrashchayetsya k svoyemu Gospodu, vzyvaya k Nemu v lyubom sostoyanii: lozha, sidya ili stoya, chtoby On pomog yemu v postigshem yego gore. A kogda Allakh otvetit na yego mol'bu i spasot ot postigshego yego gorya, on otvratitsya ot puti Allakha, prodolzhaya svoyo nepovinoveniye i zabyvaya milost' Allakha k nemu, budto yego i ne postigalo gore, i on ne vzyval k Allakhu. Tak shaytan razukrasil nevernym ikh nechestivyye deyaniya i porochnost'
